thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 27 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-RumbleON Q4 Loss Per Share $0.28

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-RumbleON Q4 Loss Per Share $0.28
text:
Feb 27 (Reuters) - Rumbleon Inc:
* RUMBLEON, INC. ANNOUNCES FINANCIAL RESULTS FOR THE FOURTH QUARTER AND FISCAL YEAR 2017
* Q4 REVENUE $3.44 MILLION * Q4 LOSS PER SHARE $0.28 * SEES Q1 2018 REVENUE $7.2 MILLION TO $7.5 MILLION * SEES Q1 2018 ‍NET LOSS RANGING FROM $3.0 MILLION TO $3.6 MILLION​
* SEES 2018 ‍REVENUE IN EXCESS OF $100 MILLION​ * ‍SEES POSITIVE CASH-FLOW FROM OPERATIONS IN SECOND HALF OF 2018 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
